title: Strong static typing, a hill I'm willing to die on
dot:
digraph{rankdir=TB;node[shape=box, style="rounded,filled", fillcolor=lightblue, fontname="Arial"];edge[fontname="Arial"];subgraph cluster_0{label="Strong Static Typing Advocacy";style=filled;color=lightgrey; StrongTyping[label="Strong Static Typing
Almost always the right choice"];Exceptions[label="Exceptions:
REPL, throwaway scripts,
hopelessly untyped environments"];Advantages[label="Advantages:
Less bugs
Better dev experience
Easier onboarding"];Disadvantages[label="Claimed Disadvantages:
Slower dev speed
Learning curve
Boilerplate"];Refutation[label="Refutation:
Tech debt accumulates faster
One-time learning cost
Less documentation/testing needed"];}StrongTyping->Advantages;StrongTyping->Disadvantages;Disadvantages->Refutation;subgraph cluster_1{label="Less Bugs Example";style=filled;color=lightgrey;RuntimeError[label="Runtime Errors:

title: Career Advice (2013)
dot:
digraph G{rankdir=TB;nodesep=0.5;ranksep=1.0;node[shape=box, style="rounded,filled", fillcolor="#f0f0f0", fontname="Arial", fontsize=10];edge[fontname="Arial", fontsize=9];subgraph cluster_0{label="Central Idea: Career Advice Reconsidered";style=filled;color=lightgrey;a[label="Don't rush into a career.
Explore yourself first."];b[label="Your job will change you.
Consider the long-term impact."];c[label="Observe older people in the field.
They are your future self."];d[label="Step outside of supporting structures.
Discover yourself before a career."];e[label="Prioritize experiences over career
advancement (initially)."]; a->{b c d e}[label="Key Considerations"];}subgraph cluster_1{label="Supporting Arguments/Examples";style=filled;color=lightgrey;sp[label="Stanford Prison Experiment:
Roles shape individuals"];td[label="Tyler Durden was wrong:
You *are* your job"];choices[label="Treyf concept:
Avoid things that lead to
unwanted transformations"];future[label="Project yourself into the future:
Visualize your life in that role"];structures[label="Escape supporting structures:
Challenge pre-defined paths"];bonanno[label="Alfredo Bonanno quote:
Leaving comfort zones is scary
but necessary for growth"];nolongsemester[label="Working life is one long semester:
Don't rush into it"];alaska[label="Example: Hitchhike to Alaska
instead of focusing solely on career"];b->{sp td};c->future;d->{structures bonanno};e->{alaska nolongsemester choices};}{rank=same;b c d e}}
